resultReferences.title: Solitaire Cube
resultReferences.description:
Classic Klondike Solitaire, built for your phone (or tablet). Smooth animations and fast touch controls make this the card game you want in your pocket.

Klondike with a twist.
• Classic klondike solitaire gameplay.
• Points are awarded for every card uncovered and every card sent to the foundation.

Think fast!  
• Each game has a time limit and bonus points are awarded for completing the game quicker.
• Blazing fast performance on all devices.  No seriously - we worked really hard on this.

No longer a solitary experience!  
• Games are played Head to Head for fun or for cold, hard cash (where allowed by law).
• Both players solve the same deck and the player who finishes with the most points win.

resultReferences.title: Blackout Bingo
resultReferences.description: Welcome to Blackout Bingo a Brand New Bingo style game where you can win Real World Rewards and Cash Prizes (where available)! Daub Fast and use fun boosts to take the Bingo world by storm. Travel the world and play in amazing and exotic places.

resultReferences.title: 21 Blitz
resultReferences.description:
21 Blitz is a mix of Blackjack and Solitaire. It's a perfect way to practice your blackjack skills, train your brain or just pass the time.

Play against real people for free then switch to cash games when you're ready to play and win!

How to Play
• Make 21s or stacks of 5 cards to score points.
• Each game has 1 full deck of cards, a perfect challenge for aspiring card counters.
• Finish the deck before the lock runs out and you'll receive a time bonus.
• Find Combos and Streak bonuses to perfect your strategy.

resultReferences.title: Cube Cube
resultReferences.description:
A fast, fun matching game that's simple to learn, but hard to master.  Featuring head to head gameplay that turns a slow paced time-waster into an ultra-addictive time destroyer. 

Drag Cubes, Score Points
• Place the shapes onto the grid. It's super simple.
• Fill rows side-to-side or top-to-bottom to clear them out and score bonus points.
• Kinda like Tetris with no gravity.

A dash of strategy goes a long way!
• Clear multiple rows with one move and you get massive Combo Bonuses.
• Clear rows in back-to-back turns and you get monster Streak Bonuses.
• These bonuses are the key to victory - but they can also gum up your board and become to harbingers of defeat.

resultReferences.title: Gin Rummy Gold
resultReferences.description:
When you play Gin Rummy Gold, you’re playing the classic card game gin rummy for real cash prizes!

Challenge your opponent in head-to-head gin rummy games. The player who wins the game wins real money as a reward!

Join the Skillz community and compete in gin rummy tournaments for cash! Best your opponents by scoring the most points first. Play a real person in classic gin rummy; it’s easy. Pick up a card and discard a card to collect the best set. Collect the points left in your opponent’s hand and knock your way to victory. The first one to hit the big score in this classic, simple gin rummy card game wins the cash!

Gin Rummy is so easy to play. Simply pick up a card then discard one from your hand. Build runs or straights of the same suit or collect 3 or more of kind from different suits. If you find the best combos and have the best meld, you’ll accumulate more points than your opponent and that lucky winner gets to pocket actual cash money!

resultReferences.title: Basketball Battle!
resultReferences.description:
Sink as many shots as you can in quick-fire finger basketball matches! An easy to play, but hard to master basketball challenge with huge rewards and prizes!

Includes tournaments and head-to-head competitions with real cash prizes (where available). 

You miss 100% of the shots you don't take!

How To Play:
• Pull back & release to shoot the basketball
• Drag left or right to rotate the basketball shooter
• Make as many shots as possible
• Get a bonus for being more accurate (percentage of missed shots versus total shots during a match)
•  Score 3 shots in a row and start making those 3 pointers!

Becoming a Pro goes a long way!
• In this quick-fire game, every shot matters. You get 90 seconds for each round to score as many shots as you can.
• Accuracy bonus for not missing shots. Bonuses are the key to victory!

How to play Farm Rivals:
1) You will be automatically matched with a similar level player.
2) Place Tetris like pieces on a huge variety of boards.
3) Score points by filling rows or columns to harvest.
4) Clear obstacles before harvesting.

Fair competition means both competitors play on the same board and have the same pieces, in the same order.

resultReferences.title: Bridge
resultReferences.description:
Bridge supports three popular variants of the card game of Bridge, Duplicate, Chicago and Rubber Bridge.

In Rubber Bridge a rubber is played as the best of 3 games. A game is won by the first team to score 100 or more points in successful contracts. This may take several deals.

In Chicago Bridge (aka Four-deal Bridge) you play 4 hands of Bridge. The winner is the partnership that scores the most points. 

In Duplicate Bridge the same hands are played by each player. Points are awarded for making and defeating contracts. The winner is the player that scores the highest number of points across the hands that comprise a tournament. 

The Duplicate Bridge tournaments are hosted by our technology partner Skillz. You can play for virtual or real money in head to head or multiplayer tournaments.
